refSource: Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
fullText:
Superior Will

Prerequisite: Wisdom 15 or Charisma 15
Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Will. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level and +4 at 21st level.
    In addition, if you are dazed or stunned, you can make a saving throw at the start of your turn to end that effect, even if the effect doesnâ€™t normally end on a save.

Published in Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 318, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 319.
